titleStmt.title: A dialogue between a minister and his parishioner concerning the Lord's Supper ... to which are annexed three several discourses, of love to God, to our neighbour, and to our very enemies / by J. Lambe ...
titleStmt.author: Lambe, John, 1648 or 9-1708.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
